content.html: Imagine if I, a customer, told you that I couldn’t log in to your website. And you responded: “You’re totally right! There is a bug. What do you think we should do about it?” This is how so many organisations respond to Black folks who point out their racism or lack of diversity
content.value:
Imagine if I, a customer, told you that I couldn’t log in to your website. And you responded: “You’re totally right! There is a bug. What do you think we should do about it?”

This is how so many organisations respond to Black folks who point out their racism or lack of diversity
